Class Simulation

  • java.lang.Object
    • Simulation
  • public class Simulation
extends java.lang.Object
    Grid-Based Marine Biology Simulation Program:
    A Simulation object controls a simulation of fish movement in a Grid-based environment.
    Version:
    25 April 2019
    Author:
    Alyce Brady (based partly on the AP CS MBS Simulation class)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Simulation​(edu.kzoo.grid.Grid env, edu.kzoo.grid.gui.GridAppFrame display)
      Constructs a Simulation object for a particular grid-based environment.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void run​(int numSteps)
      Runs the simulation for as many steps as specified.
      void step()
      Runs through a single step of this simulation.
